channel.title: Jolt Environment v2 - C# RuneScape Emulator - From Stratch!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://oi44.tinypic.com/2ce51er.jpg[/img][/center]
[b]Jolt Environment is an open source server suite aimed to emulate RuneScape, a fantasy massive multiplayer online role-playing game. Jolt is fast, powerful, and reliable. First created as an alternate to frameworks available in 2009, it is now one of the most anticipated open source emulators out today. Under the GNU License agreement, the project files are free for distribution and developing. It is required that you do not remove the banner in the source files to show support for the original developer.[/b]
[b]The Team:[/b] [i]TheAJ MangiS[/i]
[b]Project website (if this is not allowed, sorry - please remove):[/b] [url=http://ajravindiran.com/jolt/]http://ajravindiran.com/jolt/[/url]
Demo site: http://demo.joltdev.com/
Some core features: RuneScape revision 666 (devil shiznit!) MySQL Scripting (used for many things already, such as commands, interfaces, etc). Multi-world support (master server, and game worlds). Update server, JAGGRAB server, chat server, Remote server Asynchronous networking Powerful low level API for game feature/content development. Very secure verification system (including password hashing) & ISAAC support OODBMS (google it yourself)
[b]SERVER MEDIA[/b] [img]http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/6209/jolt1.png[/img]
[img]http://img204.imageshack.us/img204/5962/666bh.jpg[/img]
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WzcEBpVKSuY
[b]ALSO SOME WEB CMS MEDIA! (THIS WILL BE RELEASED WITH JOLT ASWELL)[/b]
[img]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/3193/frontend.png[/img] [img]http://img195.imageshack.us/img195/5854/dashboardt.png[/img] [img]http://img222.imageshack.us/img222/9434/serverinfo.png[/img] [img]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/7166/appeals.png[/img] [img]http://img850.imageshack.us/img850/883/addoffence.png[/img] [img]http://img408.imageshack.us/img408/4401/manageoffence.png[/img] [img]http://img854.imageshack.us/img854/7460/offencesr.png[/img]
Updates will be posted on this thread.

item.title: Jolt Environment v2 - C# RuneScape Emulator - From Stratch!
item.dc:creator: @TheAJ TheAJ
item.description:
@TheAJ wrote:

_Vengeance:

I’ve just recently begun writing a C# based server, also. Just curious as to how efficient your player and entity updating system is? Have you tried it against heavy loads?

We recently have. The server at majority was really efficient and stable. There were a few crashes, but obviously they have been fixed
As for development, much of the core is finished, and we’ll continue adding new skills, and other content as time comes.
We’re also planning to integrate support for Linux/Mac machines.

Read full topic

item.title: Jolt Environment v2 - C# RuneScape Emulator - From Stratch!
item.dc:creator: @TheAJ TheAJ
item.description:
@TheAJ wrote:

The Wanderer:

Wait. So you wrote your own or you are using C# for scripts?

I’m using C# for scripts. It allows us to use the full potential of the server core, instead of having a higher-level scripting language, and gives us less flexibility.

Read full topic

item.title: Jolt Environment v2 - C# RuneScape Emulator - From Stratch!
item.dc:creator: @TheAJ TheAJ
item.description:
@TheAJ wrote:

The Wanderer:

So scripts just provide functionality. Was wondering because I had wrote skill content for apollo in Java and was wondering if I should convert it to a ruby script instead. What scripting languages does it support?

The scripting language is also written in C#.
